name: xGoatz
highlight: xGoatz is a collection of 200 goats NFTS, launched as an experiment to bridge the gap between DEFI and real farmers.
summary: xGoatz is aiming to bring back interest around eco-friendly farmers and shepherds with funny NFTS collections, while partnering with farmers in need to fund their projects. We are educating people about the power of well done agriculture, short circuits, high-quality food and products.
